name: The Master's Fighter
overview: The Master's Fighter is a 2D fighting game in the style of the Street Fighter series. The game features these game modes: Story mode: The player select one of the game character's and have to defeat the rest of the characters. VS Mode: Fight against another human or computer player. Watch Mode: Watch a fight without play it. The game features 11 different selectable characters (Mishell, Takuya, Long Way, Kang, Camp, Bill, Kain, Azarl, Mr Death, J & Sakamoto) at the beginning. In the in game options menu if you select in the first line the right one you have the menus in english.
